title: Kate Walsh (actress)
summary: Kathleen Erin Walsh (born October 13, 1967) is an American actress. She is best known for her role as Dr. Addison Montgomery on the ABC television dramas Grey's Anatomy and Private Practice. She is also known for her roles as Rebecca Wright on Bad Judge, Olivia Baker on 13 Reasons Why, Nicki Fifer on The Drew Carey Show, The Handler on The Umbrella Academy, and Madeline Wheeler on Emily in Paris.
